mention.text: LOS ANGELES Police Chief Daryl Gates
an off-duty Los Angeles police officer
this week over the beating of a black motorist
the beating of a black motorist
A high-ranking commission appointed after the beating , under the chairmanship of Mr Warren Christopher
the first black head of the Los Angeles force
